p: Of the nine viruses searched for, only six were identified: RSV ( n = 56), rhinovirus ( n = 27), metapneumovirus ( n = 26), adenovirus ( n = 9), influenza virus ( n = 6) and parainfluenza type 3 ( n = 3). No parainfluenza viruses types 1, 2 and 4 were identified; and no coronavirus was isolated ( Fig. 3).
